ar: 1. سيكون لكل فرد مجلس مؤقت ، والذي يمكن استخدامه لدعوة الأصدقاء لدخول النادي لحراسة صندوق الكنز.
en: 1. Everyone will have a temporary club, which can be used to invite friends to enter the club to protect the chest.
hi: 1. Everyone will have a temporary club, which can be used to invite friends to enter the club to protect the chest.
name: rule_1
tr: 1. Everyone will have a temporary club, which can be used to invite friends to enter the club to protect the chest.
zh: 1、每个人都将拥有一个临时会所，可以用来邀请朋友进入会所守护宝箱。

ar: 2. صندوق الكنز (غير مفتوح) سيتم الحصول عليه بشكل عشوائي عند منتصف الليل (غرينتش + 0) كل يوم.
en: 2. Every day at 00:00 (UTC+0) will randomly get a chest (unopened).
hi: 2. Every day at 00:00 (UTC+0) will randomly get a chest (unopened).
name: rule_2
tr: 2. Every day at 00:00 (UTC+0) will randomly get a chest (unopened).
zh: 2、每天零点（UTC+0)会随机获得一个宝箱（未打开）。

ar: 3. بالنسبة لصناديق الكنوز غير المفتوحة ، يمكنك دعوة الأصدقاء لدخول المجلس المؤقت الخاص بك لحراستهم ، اعتمادًا على صندوق الكنز ، يختلف وقت الحراسة ، فكلما ارتفع مستوى صندوق الكنز ، زادت المكافآت.
en: 3. The unopened chest can be guarded by inviting friends to enter your club together. Different chests have different guard time. The higher the chest level, the richer the rewards.
hi: 3. The unopened chest can be guarded by inviting friends to enter your club together. Different chests have different guard time. The higher the chest level, the richer the rewards.
name: rule_3
tr: 3. The unopened chest can be guarded by inviting friends to enter your club together. Different chests have different guard time. The higher the chest level, the richer the rewards.
zh: 3、未打开的宝箱可以邀请朋友一起进入你的临时会所进行守护，根据宝箱不同，守护时长不同，越高等级的宝箱奖励越丰富。

ar: 4. بعد دخول صندوق الكنز إلى المجلس وبدء الحراسة ، لا يمكن إلغاء الحراسة ، وسيتم شغل المجلس لفترة من الوقت (مدة حراسة صندوق الكنز + 10 دقائق من الهدوء ) ، خلال هذه الفترة ، لا يمكنك إحضار صناديق الكنوز الجديدة في المجلس الخاص بك.
en: 4. After the chest enters the club and starts guarding, the guarding cannot be cancelled, and the club will be occupied for a period of time (guard time + 10 minutes cooldown), during this period, you cannot bring new chests into your own club.
hi: 4. After the chest enters the club and starts guarding, the guarding cannot be cancelled, and the club will be occupied for a period of time (guard time + 10 minutes cooldown), during this period, you cannot bring new chests into your own club.
name: rule_4
tr: 4. After the chest enters the club and starts guarding, the guarding cannot be cancelled, and the club will be occupied for a period of time (guard time + 10 minutes cooldown), during this period, you cannot bring new chests into your own club.
zh: 4、宝箱进入会所开始守护后，无法取消守护，会所会被占用一段时间（宝箱守护时长+10分钟冷却），在这期间，无法携带新宝箱进入自己的会所。

ar: 5. بعد أن يقوم كلا المستخدمين بالحراسة في المجلس لفترة معينة من الوقت ، سيقومان بحراسة صندوق الكنز بنجاح ، ويمكنهما فتح صندوق الكنز ، والحصول بشكل عشوائي على واحدة من الجوائز العديدة الموجودة في صندوق الكنز. (ستصبح سارية المفعول مباشرة بعد الحصول على الجائزة ، وسيتم تجميع مدة نفس العنصر)
en: 5. After both guardians have guarded in the club for a certain period of time, they will successfully guard the chest, and can open the chest, randomly get one of the prizes in the chest. (the rewards will take effect directly, and the duration of the same item will be accumulated)
hi: 5. After both guardians have guarded in the club for a certain period of time, they will successfully guard the chest, and can open the chest, randomly get one of the prizes in the chest. (the rewards will take effect directly, and the duration of the same item will be accumulated)
name: rule_5
tr: 5. After both guardians have guarded in the club for a certain period of time, they will successfully guard the chest, and can open the chest, randomly get one of the prizes in the chest. (the rewards will take effect directly, and the duration of the same item will be accumulated)
zh: 5、守护者双方都在会所守护达到一定时间后，将成功守护宝箱，并能打开宝箱，随机获得宝箱众多奖品里的一件。（获得奖品后直接生效，同一个道具的时长将累加）

ar: ملاحظة: الحراسة عمل مشترك ، ويجب أن يكون كلا الطرفين في المجلس ، إذا غادر أحد الطرفين المجلس وفشل في العودة في غضون دقيقة واحدة ، فإن حراسة صندوق الكنز ستفشل. استمتعا بوقتكما في المجلس معًا!
en: Add: Guarding is a joint action, and both guardians need to be in the club. If one of guardians leaves the club and fails to return to the club within 1 minute, the chest guarding will fail. Enjoy your time in the club together!
hi: Add: Guarding is a joint action, and both guardians need to be in the club. If one of guardians leaves the club and fails to return to the club within 1 minute, the chest guarding will fail. Enjoy your time in the club together!
name: rule_6
tr: Add: Guarding is a joint action, and both guardians need to be in the club. If one of guardians leaves the club and fails to return to the club within 1 minute, the chest guarding will fail. Enjoy your time in the club together!
zh: 补充：守护是个共同的行为，需要守护者双方都在会所里，若有一方离开会所，且在1分钟内未能回到会所中，则宝箱守护失败。好好享受你们共同的会所时光吧！
